label.h3: In Trainingland, which of the following are available dashboards?

choiceresponse.description: Select all that apply. Hint: Be sure to expand the control bar to see all available dashboards.

div.p: In Trainingland, the following dashboards are available: HIV Burden, Immunisation Maps and Malaria Trends and Coverage. Be sure to expand the control bar, (by clicking on the small down arrow) to see all available dashboards.
